attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We disagree with giving the Police the Powers to stop and search all citizens in the guise of anti-terrorism. This law will be leading to a Police State and will criminalise ordinary law abiding citizens when the Police feel like being heavy handed,or just when they take a dislike to someone due to appearance or law abiding political views.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
